title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the Cuban Missile Crisis, but were afraid to ask
itunes:title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the Cuban Missile Crisis, but were afraid to ask
itunes:subtitle: Mark White responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about the Cold War nuclear confrontation between the US and the USSR. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the latest of our series tackling the big questions on major historical topics, historian Mark White responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about the Cold War nuclear confrontation between the US and the USSR. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
